name: The Widsith
desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
skill_desc:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
Recitative: ATK is increased by  60%/75%/90%/105%/120%
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%.
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240/300/360/420/480.
